website_summaries.verdict: Best for people who weigh 150 lbs. or less, this affordable topper is known for its durability and consistent support.
cons: May not be supportive enough for users over 150 lbs

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend - Great Support
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for about 5 months and it's for a full mattress. I paid ~75 dollars. I haven't noticed a decline in support or any soft spots forming. I will recommend buying a mattress cover as well, because I've noticed the pad slightly yellowing over time (from the oil in one's skin). I mean, I bathe daily and change my sheets weekly, so it isn't like I'm a dirty person. I live in a dorm with a plastic-covered mattress and a hard spring brace. It was difficult to sleep prior to this topper. It's great with it. Now, I actually have something of value to lure my girlfriend over.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Raising 5 grandchildren and their mattress are about the cheapest you can get. Couple of years ago, due to bad back problems I invested in DreamFoam Mattress Ultimate Dreams 13-Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress, which they all love. Well, can't really afford to buy 5 of those in twin so I ended up researching and choosing this foam topper for their beds. They LOVE it. We only just purchased, but all 5 are thrilled with this. If something changes over time, I will repost but for now, it seems like a good alternative. They are soft but firm so there is some support while being "cradled" and no pressure points like they had just on the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Zehner

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever did for my back.
customer_reviews.text: I was in tears from back pain when we got our new bed and I was 8 months pregnant. We put this on and OH MY GOSH. I never want to leave my bed now. My mattress looks fantastic still and it has held up to the wear of two adults and two toddlers jumping and sneaking their way into to our obviously amazing bed. If you want a HUGE difference in your bed, go for the 3"! I am a hefty girl, and my husband is over 200 pounds and loves it. Reviewing this late and it's still working great 2 years later!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Brooks

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: GET THIS THING WHILE THE SALE IS THIS GOOD! Spending 60-70 bucks on this when its worth 378 is so worth it. My mattress is 18 years old and as soon as I put this on it, it felt brand new. Neutralize the smell with some air freshener or odoban and it eliminates the problem right away. Also give the pad a few hours to lay flat on your mattress so it can puff back up. The shipping was also incredibly fast, it arrived over a week before the estimated delivery date. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: MaddieLee15

customer_reviews.title: Makes my bed feel new again
customer_reviews.text: Have been wanting a memory top for my queen sized bed for quite a while and this was perfect. It took less time to form than in the description. Has a very slight odor that fades quickly once in use. Makes my bed feel new again and I'm sleeping like a baby every night. When I finally decide to replace my mattress, my next one will be memory foam. Best invention ever!! I love that this came with a 20 year warranty too. I highly recommend this memory foam topper and suggest when flipping your mattress, flip the memory foam too, to keep it wearing consistently and adding to the longevity of the topper.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdy

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product, and I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely old mattress, so I needed something to bring it back to life. This did just the trick! It is extremely soft and contours to the shape of your body (without sinking in too deep). I do have to say it takes a while for it to puff up once you take it out of the box. It also has a very strange chemical kind of warehouse scent the first couple of days, but it went away after airing it out. Overall a great product, and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Love IT
customer_reviews.text: My back finally does not hurt, the first night on this Cloud 9 was truly a Cloud 9 experience, My Husband really loves it as He is in bed most of the time due to poor health, and for Him to be so pleased is a real test. We both Love our Cloud 9 foam topper. I think next time I would spend the extra and go 4 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Loviska

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in April 2017. The first one arrived defective and had to be returned. Awesome service with the return and replacement, however, after about 6 months, the memory foam no longer 'remembers' to return to it's original shape. I even tried flipping it over, but it didn't help. Needless to say, I am disappointed in the quality. I won't replace this mattress topper with anything similar to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Deb G.

customer_reviews.title: Compression set issue, wrinkles, not very dense... Sort of like cheap foam
customer_reviews.text: Product has been laying flat on my floor for 3 days and it has still not flattered out completely. The foam is not nearly as dense as I had expected. It's more like cheap low density foam than memory foam. We just moved into a new home and were hoping the topper would make for a great addition... Now we will initiate a return for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: My daughter absolutely loves it and i am certainly happier; instead of $400 spent
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought my daughter the exact mattress pad for her dorm that she wanted. After getting to the college and setting up the room, the memory foam never was what they claimed as far as thickness and length. After talking to her roommate's mom, who bought this one, I rushed home to order ASAP. My daughter absolutely loves it and i am certainly happier; instead of $400 spent, this less then $100 "cloud" is truly ranked #1 for me. I would recommend to everyone. Now my daughter wants one for home too!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Maglione

customer_reviews.title: Better for a small bed and a single person.
customer_reviews.text: As a tall person I ordered the thicker pad suggested by my weight. I tried it for a week. It now sits rolled up in the closet. The foam is not firm enough to hold a tall adult of average weight. I had to fling my body out of bed in the morning. Every time I tried to roll over, I had to muster enough force to get out of the hole I created. If this was for me in college in a twin bed. I'm sure it would have been fine. But for a couple sleeping in a queen size. NO. Unless of course you like the mountain of foam between you and your partner.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Saved me money!
customer_reviews.text: I had been considering purchasing a new mattress this year until I purchased this foam topper to my 10 year mattress. It has been a noticeable improvement. I have not had any complaints. I aired it out for 24-48 hours before first using it. It doesn't compact or stay in your body shape for any extended time if you toss and turn. I haven't been overheating since using it, which was a concern. I would recommend to family and friends who are wanting comfort and not yet ready for a new mattress to extend the life and comfort of their bedding and a better nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: A.Fox

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: You definitely need to let it off-gas for a few hours. I bought it to put atop a very stiff mattress that normally had us tossing and turning all night. We sleep so much better now. Just remember you need a deeper pocket fitted sheet to accommodate the added depth.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this topper for several months and it still performs like new! I am a 250 pound man and I was skeptical about the 3 inch thickness, but it provides for a very pleasant sleep night after night. It has not lost its cushion or memory, and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased will buy another one!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't familiar with Cloud 9 did a lot of research actually purchased a Serta and wasn't happy with it the measurements and the wait advertise weren't what was delivered to my front door. The Cloud 9 was amazing I will order another one I've had a couple of back surgeries and most certainly it's you know it's not not like $2,000 bed absolutely just sleep heaven. Sleep is such an issue in our nation so I absolutely recommended absolutely the way it fit across the bed and it lasted for a little over two years I'll definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Waylona Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. This is my second mattress topper, the first from Cloud9. It felt good in the beginning but over time a depression develops where I sleep. I've tried turning it over and around but it does not spring back and support my back the way my previous memory foam topper did.
customer_reviews.author: MargaretW

customer_reviews.title: Is perfect. Fits the bed like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Is perfect. Fits the bed like a charm. Is incredibly soft. I just sink into the bed now. My bed was hard before I got this one and now I look forward to going to bed. My back feels good in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie dill

customer_reviews.title: Just Like Sleeping on a Cloud
customer_reviews.text: This memory foam pad was delivered in record speed, just a matter of three or four days. It sprang to life and was good to go in 24 hours. The slight odor I noticed when unwrapping the pad was gone in a matter of hours. I have been sleeping on it comfortably for about four months. Because it was so reasonably priced I was concerned about the quality, but as it turn out it was just a good bargain. Anyone who likes a soft, cool, comfortable memory foam pad at a great price I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mississippi Gal

customer_reviews.title: Didn't retain shape
customer_reviews.text: Topper didn't retain its shape just after a few months. Was sent replacement that never inflated correctly and remained deformed. Poor customer service in addition to poor product. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping on Cloud 7 instead of 9
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have the spring that I had hoped for. It needs to be thicker for me. I think for someone younger it would be great. I am older and have several bone issues. I wouldn't discourage anyone from buying it but I would just remind people with bone issues that a thicker mattress might prove more supportive. It was advertised honestly and it fit well. I think it is just my situation that makes me only like it and not love it. Just keep that in mind. It is not a terrible product just a little mediocre.
customer_reviews.author: Doug V.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: We have a bed at my mother in-law's that we call the "cruel bed". It's better than the floor...maybe. This addition really added to the ability to sleep; so we didn't wake up with bruises up and down our bodies after a nights sleep. I now don't need an hour long hot shower to return feeling to my body after sleeping. I can only imagine how this would make a comfortable bed feel!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Saved my back...
customer_reviews.text: My bed was so uncomfortable, you could feel the plywood through the damn thing. Thanks to this memory foam cover, I sleep like a baby, and no more back pain. You can't beat a good night's sleep, and for the price this mattress can deliver it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Its generous size covered the entire mattress and is quite comfortable. However
customer_reviews.text: The cloud 9 memory foam mattress topper came in only a couple of days from ordering. Its generous size covered the entire mattress and is quite comfortable. However, it took me a few nights to get used to sleeping on memory foam. It now gives me a good night's sleep. I am an older person with constant back and hip pain which the Cloud 9 seems to relieve when sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Organgrinder

customer_reviews.title: Firm and enduring
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over 5 years ago and am still enjoying it. It is firm, supportable and comfortable compared to other memory foam that was too soft and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ellen Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's amazing what a good mattress pad can do to an uncomfortable mattress
customer_reviews.author: Greg B

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this topper to help with a rock-hard futon I impulse bought for my new apartment. The first few nights were spectacular and I slept wonderfully, but after week I noticed the cushion began to weaken, and I once again felt that futon underneath. I'm 5'9 150, so I'm not exceedingly heavy, which makes the weakness of this topper all the more baffling. I'm still giving this item 2 stars because it does help mitigate some of the discomfort found in the futon. However, had I known the memory foam would wear out within a month, I would have spent the cash on a thicker topper or a better known brand. Heavier buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bit of added softness to my mattress and this fit the bill. It is very comfortable and adds just enough softness without giving up the firmness of my mattress. I sleep better and for longer intervals with this topper. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyqu

customer_reviews.title: What a fantastic purchase! My wife has not slept this well ...
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic purchase! My wife has not slept this well since I met her. It was the addition that we were looking for. As far as the strong chemical smell that people have complained about in their reviews......hogwash. I removed the packaging, laid the pad on the bed, and made the bed 8 hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Wahl

customer_reviews.title: totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: This foam topper arrived on time for my desperate situation of trying to make a sofabed more comfortable. It made the difference between comfortable and wanting to set the sofa on fire. It wasn't smelly when I opened the package like some products of this sort can be, and it quickly filled out. It was the correct size. This is my first experience with foam mattress toppers, so maybe I'm not expecting too much, but it makes a world of difference to me, and I heartily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CM Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: this is just like sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: this is just like sleeping on a cloud! i no longer have back pain! so so so happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: It was a tad bit too big for my double mattress, but with the mattress pad cover I was able to secure it. I actually was surprised that it will take a little getting use to. It does provide a firmer surface & I was pleased that I did not feel the discomfort in my right hip that tends to bother me at night on just the mattress. Last night was the 1st time I slept on it, so time will tell if it was a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Reilly

customer_reviews.title: good night sleep
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL WONDERFUL, I feel like I have died and gone to heaven most of the time. I have trouble sleeping all night. Has been a big improvement.. It has helped my aching back and have improved in that area. I wish I had ordered this top along time ago. My sleep pattern as improved about 80%. I wouldn't trade this for anything, Love it Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerj

customer_reviews.title: folds up like a soft taco and suffocates you
customer_reviews.text: too soft, too hot, folds up like a soft taco and suffocates you. Tried to get my money back, automatically sent me another mattress, sucked just as bad. several weeks later, still trying to get money back.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this one!
customer_reviews.text: I really do hate this mattress topper. In spite of the fact that I toss and turn a lot, it does NOT pop back, but when I get up every morning, there is a deep concavity where I slept - and it is still there when I go to bed at night. Even my 9-pound cat makes an indentation! I am ready to put it out for the scavengers to pick up. I really wish I had returned it when I still could.
customer_reviews.author: Araknophyl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome topper for the price. Bought it twice. First time for my wife and I, second time as a Christmas gift. Shipping the first time took a week and the second time arrived in 3 days. The only issue was with my wife starting in the second trimester of pregnancy she was very uncomfortable sleeping with it. So we had to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: WOW...What great service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the replacement after finding the first order a little too soft, and the instant service, and the response was sensational!! They not only replaced it, but upgraded to help me get a better nights sleep. Although I just received, I haven't slept on it yet, it appears to be very comfortable. The service was the best I've ever received on Internet purchases, and will highly recommend to anyone needing a mattress topper. Thanks again Allsleep
customer_reviews.author: RICK22

customer_reviews.title: Great for Side Sleepers
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely comfortable if you are a side sleeper. However, when I lay on my back (e.g. when I watch TV), it's not firm enough to support my lower back comfortably. Overall it's great though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! The price is great. I didn't have any issues with the smell. I aired it for a day -- the smell was gone in 4 hours. I have slept incredibly comfortably ever since I got it. Getting fitted sheets over it requires some effort, but the added comfort is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LCS

customer_reviews.title: Great topper
customer_reviews.text: My memory foam mattress topper was delivered very quickly. It seems to be of high quality, is super comfortable and most importantly for me- it barely smelled of chemicals at all! When I have purchased other memory foam products- I have had to let them air out for over a week to get the terrible smell out. This one- I left it out for one day- and I was good to go. All memory foam products will have some smell when first opened- this one was by far the best I've encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a good solution in order to give to your mattress an extra cushion. You can extend the life of your mattres by buying one of those. We have been using this for months and shape remains unvariable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Black

customer_reviews.title: Very soft but too hot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to soften my mattress. I does soften the sleep surface, but as usual with foam, it is very warm to sleep on. That will be great during the cold months, but not so much in the hot months. To decrease the warmth, I put a quilt over it. That has helped but it is still too warm. However, I will just have to get used to it and remind myself to not buy anything foam again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I ordered this topper for my bed. It is the most comfortable sleeping experience I could ever ask for. As so as I lay down, its not long before I am asleep and do not wake up during the night. I would recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Buy the thicker 5.3  4"
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the 5.3 cloud9 4" for me and my husband and love it. I bought this one for my son and the less dense thinner just doesnt cut it. I really wish I had spent the extra money and bought the 5.3 4" again.
customer_reviews.author: Jean9

customer_reviews.title: ... the purpose of allowing me to sleep with my bad shoulder, but it's a little hotter than I ...
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose of allowing me to sleep with my bad shoulder, but it's a little hotter than I expected to sleep on. The pad was oversized for my mattress, but as long as I use the deep sided mattress cover, it bends the edges over enough to make it work. I thought it was covered by a fabric cover, which it isn't, so that was a bit disappointing. But overall, it makes the bed much more comfortable and we sleep well.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: I bought for my brother and he loves it. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my brother and he loves it. Only problem is he is a big man at 6'3" and 200 lbs and we should have got one that was thicker. Did not take long to air out . about 24 hours
customer_reviews.author: jpmamaduck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfy. Price is reasonable compared to the multitude others.
customer_reviews.author: williewyotech

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Good name for this: Cloud 9! My sofa sleeper is overly firm, so I bought this topper and it's perfect. Just the right amount of comfort and support.
customer_reviews.author: SF-KimChi

customer_reviews.title: Great product but....
customer_reviews.text: I really do enjoy this mattress topper. My mattress is pretty old and I havnt been sleeping well lately. This topper fixed that issue for the most part. My only thought is I've noticed getting pretty hot at night. I sleep with a fan on so it isn't an issue I just put the fan on me but it might be a concern for some people especially if you're a heavier set person.
customer_reviews.author: xIRON MANx

customer_reviews.title: Happy College Student!!
customer_reviews.text: My college student was having trouble sleeping on the old tired dorm mattress. This mattress topper was just what the doctor ordered! I'm happy to report that he's sleeping more comfortably. In his words "it's great!"
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sweet dreams
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for her twin bed. She was telling me her bed was so hard that she wasn't resting well. So her updated was that she loved it and was very appreciative for the gift. Sweet dreams baby girl!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed seven months later
customer_reviews.text: After ordering this mattress for my guest bed, it is now flattened out and the edges are protruding over the top of the mattress. And I have had only one guest that stayed three times, over a seven month period, for about four days at a time, and the mattress topper stretched out. This is not a firm mattress topper because a firm one would be heavy to move or turn over. I do not recommend this product for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Mom

customer_reviews.title: Summary Review
customer_reviews.text: The Cloud 9 bedding is a home run !! I got the Cloud 9 for my daughter for a Christmas present , the next day I asked her how was your new cloud 9 ? She replied Dad it was like sleeping on a Cloud !! I also would like to Thank customer service, I had made a mistake on the size of the bedding and the time to resolve my mistake was unbelievable you guys rock ! I definitely give customer Service Five Star Rating. Thank You Best Regards Dez Sherwood
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: i'm in love! I ordered this topper just before new year
customer_reviews.text: I probably shouldn't review this yet, but oh my, i'm in love! I ordered this topper just before new year, received it yesterday. After a night of letting it expand and off gas (i recommend liberal applications of febreze to help get rid of the chemical stench), i threw it across my bed while linens are in the laundry. The addition of a quilt and pillows in the meantime and i'm in heaven! It's cushy and cozy, and quickly snaps back when you leave the bed. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: gwhizcat

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Very comfortable. I took a star away because it has no cover. I will be using this product in an RV, therefore a cover is needed to ward of dirt and such. 8-14-2015 Update Mattress has started to breakdown after two outings in the RV. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Feedback

customer_reviews.title: This topper is very comfortable and rejuvenated my too-firm mattress
customer_reviews.text: This topper is very comfortable and rejuvenated my too-firm mattress. It has held up quite well-I suggest a sturdy mattress cover if you have pets with sharp claws.
customer_reviews.author: MHY

customer_reviews.title: Makes every bed the most comfortable bed!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper makes every bed you sleep on the most comfortable bed you've ever slept on. We used it for a long time sleeping on an air mattress, and we would have never known it was an air mattress. Now, we use it on our guest bed - and our guests always ask us where we got such a comfortable bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Vannurden

customer_reviews.title: ... for only 2 days my wife and are extremely pleased with the topper
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for only 2 days my wife and are extremely pleased with the topper, no more tossing and turning and most important no backache in the morning. I wish we had bought one sooner. I would recommend this to anyone with a back problem.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter & son-in-law for Christmas and they have called and texted me MANY times telling me how wonderful it is. She did mention that now she knows why I like to sleep in such a cold room (I have one too) because it does hold your body heat but that has NEVER gotten in the way of all the comfort and support you get out of it. Sweet Dreams are being had by many on this wonderful topper!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: came in super early
customer_reviews.text: ordered other things and it came in b4 those. very comfortable and makes a big difference with my mattress instead of buying a whole new bed
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Crochet

customer_reviews.title: FAST delivery
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving it a 4 as of now because I haven't gotten to actually sleep on it. I did take a nap on it and it was really comfortable. What I do LOVE is it came a lot faster then they even said I was looking at a 2 week delivery time it was here is 2 days.. I will update after a few nights of sleep on it...
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the sofa bed in our camper and this fits the bill perfectly. Why in the world would I spend more for a product that does exactly the same thing as this does? As the headline for my review reads: Get it. A review just can't get any simpler than that.
customer_reviews.author: NHDalton

customer_reviews.title: Our kids bought a less expensive mattress when they got ...
customer_reviews.text: Our kids bought a less expensive mattress when they got married and now they feel it! This saved them from having to buy a new mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Hambone

customer_reviews.title: She has a bad back and needed extra support on those wonderful college ...
customer_reviews.text: After a couple attempts to buy a memory foam pad for my daughter in college, we came across this one. She ordered it and loves it! She has a bad back and needed extra support on those wonderful college mattresses the dorms provide!
customer_reviews.author: Ring crafter

customer_reviews.title: Not As Good As I Thought It'd Be
customer_reviews.text: The foam is a very nice extra cushion to my bed, but after putting it on and sleeping with it for a few nights, I found I didn't like it as much as I thought I would. When lying on the topper, it isn't a very dense foam so you completely sink into it and down to the mattress under it. It also takes so time for your body to get used to the new comfort and almost a change in pillow position and height.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would reccomend this to anyone that has pressure point pain. I tell my friends that it is a perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Newcomb Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for someone you know well. LOL
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a give for a friend. It amy seem odd to give a friend something for a bed, but I do know him well enough to have heard for too long how terribly he sleeps. He has shared that he awakens several times every night for no reason. I took teh leap adn purchsed this for him. He called yesterday to tell me he has not slept so well in two years. For me it is wonderful to have found a great gift, and for him it was wonderful sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: I've had this topper for about 3 months and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this topper for about 3 months and it does not bounce back from where I sleep. It has developed a permanent intention and I am having issues with a sore neck that I have never had before.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Buckelew

customer_reviews.title: Had this over a year and it's still in great condition just wish I would have gotten a thicker ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this over a year and it's still in great condition just wish I would have gotten a thicker one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Seebruch

customer_reviews.title: ... item so my husband would be able to sleep better. It does not fit the bill as it ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item so my husband would be able to sleep better. It does not fit the bill as it goes flat where you lie on it and it just irritated his back more than just being on the mattress! I would not purchase another one. Mine is now taking up space in the spare bedroom as I do not know what to do with it yet. Maybe take it to the Church Re-sale shop and let them find a new home for it.Was disappointed that it did not hold up as it was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: This was super comfy for the first couple of days but then I noticed ours formed valleys where we sleep...so now not only do we have to climb over a mountain of we want to cuddle, but when we want to get out of bed we have to climb out of the valley...but you get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.author: Rylie H.

customer_reviews.title: as expected, however would suggest airing out for several ...
customer_reviews.text: as expected, however would suggest airing out for several days before actually placing on bed as there was noxious smell for about 24 hours after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Francisco

customer_reviews.title: It's a very coushon convenient for sleeping not that hot in summer, keep covering it with blankets for foam.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very coushon convenient for sleeping. I'm not much bothered about the sayings its hot, its not that hot for me in summer. Just be sure to cover it with multiple blankets who knows what the foam does to your health, so keep covering it with blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Tomer Ben David

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo comfy! I wake up all the time in the same exact position I fell asleep in. Didn't really smell when I opened it. But you should flip it and turn it when you change your sheets or with the season so it breaks in well, just as you should with a mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Drew#&

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have tried three different toppers. First a foam; then visco elastic. The visco was better than the foam but it was dense and not comfortable for me. I weigh about 120 lbs. The Cloud9 is not as dense and works very well for me. I have noticed that I seem to sleep better and stay asleep longer. I have had the topper for about 2 weeks. So far, I think it's the best.
customer_reviews.author: Judy P Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: A little warm, but very comfy and cozy. It moves around a bit and slides off the edge of the bed now and then, but pushes back fairly easily. We have a waterproof cover over top of it also (little kids that climb in bed with mom and dad at night!), and it fits well. We had to replace the old pad, and this was a step up in quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jill W.

customer_reviews.title: My needs were met
customer_reviews.text: I sleep on a combination Sofa, Chaise Lounge and Full-size Bed. It has that seam down the middle ( where the sofa fold is ) which makes sleeping uncomfortable. The mattress Topper has eliminated the seam and the discomfort yet I can still use it as a Chaise Lounge or Sofa. The advertising claims are true--it is like sleeping on a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Strothers

customer_reviews.title: This foam does not respond quick enough! Stays flat ...
customer_reviews.text: This foam does not respond quick enough! Stays flat when you move around! This needs to be a higher density!
customer_reviews.author: tom tower

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 7 months ago.. it was great for about 2-3 months and it just keeps getting worse and worse.. it's completely worn out, turned yellow and it's not comfy anymore. I am a college student and I use it for my apartment, but I also go back home every other weekend and I also spend time at my girlfriends place so over the 7 months it hasn't been used every night. not good quality, don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Dream sleeper
customer_reviews.text: This is possibly the best memory foam topper I have used. I like that it has some firmness to it but is still soft and lets your body sink in but still supports you. The prior one I had was a bit to soft and did not add enough support for my back. It provides great support without having a firm pad underneath it so you can flip the mattress over and use both sides. All in all an amazing mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Schramm

customer_reviews.title: Cloud 9 is an accurate description
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this memory foam mattress topper. I have used others in the past, but this is my favorite so far. It also arrived a day sooner than I was expecting. Pleasant and satisfied describes my overall experience.
customer_reviews.author: Medina

customer_reviews.title: It's so comfortable! It's also a great value for 3 1/3" ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this memory foam topper for a vacation home bed that caused my shoulders to ache after two days of sleeping on it. The topper has done the trick! It's so comfortable! It's also a great value for 3 1/3" foam for under $100 and free shipping. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Galligan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for quite a while now and it’s still holding up great. Little bit of discoloring but that to be expected
customer_reviews.author: Suga Essentials

customer_reviews.title: they are in love with this topper
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and her husband for Christmas gift, they are in love with this topper! Said they sleep like babies!!
customer_reviews.author: debra roberts

customer_reviews.title: Don't worry about the creases.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I first opened the package because the topper was so ceased and dented from being so tightly packaged. After about two days it fluffed right up and is super cozy and comfy. I'll get a few more years out of my cheapo guest bed using this topper. It is thick. Three inches doesn't sound thick but when it's on the bed it really feels luxurious. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: YankeeBelle

customer_reviews.title: Cushions my body like healing cloud of relief
customer_reviews.text: This topper takes away pressure pain, and was a Great choice for a better nights sleep .My firm Viscos mattress felt like cement, and this topper made effective difference as my body needs changed!
customer_reviews.author: NEZ

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the price & a bargain for 3". It's comfortable, but I didn't notice until sleeping on it for about a week that there is a crimp in the middle of the pad which makes it sag in the middle.so now I try to sleep to either side, which is not so fun. I would have returned it but the thought of trying to fold & box it made me tired. Compared to the prices of other decent foam mattress pads I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: shasha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: we bought these for our children's twin size beds that where uncomfortable and when they arrived we put them on and they take about two hours to fluff up we also bought waterproof mattress protectors to put over them and the mattress which surprisingly fit nicely so any spilling would not go through to either so they will last longer, which I recommend ! and they feel so comfy and soft!!!
customer_reviews.author: M.J .

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: We're replacing an old memory foam mattress topper that was about half the thickness. Although neither my husband or myself are over 200 lbs, I bought the 3" topper and it's wonderful. We're very happy with it and the comfortable rest we're getting! I highly recommend it. It also arrived extremely fast!!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Like laying on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: This is the best money I ever spent. I love this, it makes my bed so soft I never want to get out of bed. It is literally like laying on a cloud, floating in the air with nothing under you.
customer_reviews.author: KS13

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for an amazing price and for only a few bucks, I have a completely new bed.... I use a futon from Ikea with a really firm pad in it so I added this to it and it now feels like a really high end bed. When in couch position it makes leisurely sitting a real comfortable experience. Very happy!! Great Value!
customer_reviews.author: itsjustme

customer_reviews.title: Very good mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: Very good mattress topper. Slept much better in our travel trailer. Also tried it on our bed at home and it was comfy. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Mead

customer_reviews.title: best sleep ever. you will not regret buying this!
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress pad I've ever used. Period. Made a horrific slab of rock dormitory bed feel more comfortable than my nice mattress at home with my parents. I will certainly invest in these in the future. Who needs a fancy mattress if you can just toss one of these on and have it be 10x more comfortable?
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I placed this pad on top of a pull-out mattress. It made it a little hard to close but it folded neatly and you can barely notice the bars on the frame. This was not hot next my body and has minimal movement on top of the mattress. I’m glad I’ve purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: I expected something thicker, not entirely sure what we received was 3" but it serves its purpose and I recommend to extend the life of mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: KaliAmanda

customer_reviews.title: Really is cloud nine
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 3.3 Cloud9 memory foam mattress to use at a vacation rental because the bed was so uncomfortable. The memory foam mattress alleviated my discomfort and I brought it home to use on y guest bed. The price was reasonable and worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: Donita L.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely improved my sleep
customer_reviews.text: I've had my bed for over 10 years and I wasn't quite ready to invest in a brand new mattress so decided to purchase this memory foam mattress... it is fantastic! I have definitely been sleeping better...well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Paterno

customer_reviews.title: If you love your kid that you're sending off to college to ...
customer_reviews.text: Turns hard dorm beds into a soft, cloud-like experience. If you love your kid that you're sending off to college to live in the dorms, get them this. If your kid has been a pain in the rear their whole life, don't get them this to teach them that life is hard! :-)
customer_reviews.author: RACD

customer_reviews.title: Literally like sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: This is heaven! My husband and I have never slept so soundly. I NEVER wake up with aches and pains like I used to. We have had this on our bed for almost a year and it still holds its shape and does not smell at all. Seriously, buy this right now. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kate

customer_reviews.title: While this is comfortable and makes my mattress less rock like
customer_reviews.text: While this is comfortable and makes my mattress less rock like, it is not the best quality. I've had for barely a month and there is an indent where I sleep that does not return shape properly. It does not fully cover my full size mattress, there is an extra inch or so all the way around so if you aren't careful putting the sheets back on you could have a sharp drop. I wanted to love it. Just disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Crissie E

customer_reviews.title: we ordered this and it broke down really fast. ...
customer_reviews.text: we ordered this and it broke down really fast...they did stand behind it and replaced it..had the replacement a ear and it is braking down....i have had over five mattress foams and this is the first one i have had to replace in less than two years!!
customer_reviews.author: marianna hall

product_meta.title: 3.3 Cloud9 Twin 3 Inch 100% Visco Elastic Memory Foam Mattress Topper by Cloud9 Bedding Memory Foam
product_meta.description: Size:Twin3.3 Cloud Visco Elastic Memory Foam out performs and relieves painful pressure points better than the leading competitor with innovative visco elastic memory foam technology and better formulation to help you sleep through the night without tossing and turning, allowing you to awake refreshed and renewed after a good nights sleep.Cloud9 Visco-elastic foam - memory foam - provides an ideal sleeping surface. In normal temperatures it is firm, but when you lay down to sleep it reacts to the temperature of your body and begins to mold itself to your shape. Weight is then distributed evenly along the surface, relieving pressure and helping you to sleep more soundly without tossing and turning. Cloud9 Memory Foam Contours perfectly and molds to your body, superior pressure relief reduces back pain, increased circulation for a deep sleep. They go right on top of your bed - very useful for making a firm, hard or old mattress much more comfortable. The "Featherlight Sleep System" will kindle a sincere delight when it's time to retire for the night. Our exclusive, "Featherlight" formula makes you feel like you are floating on CLOUD9, sailing forth into a sea of enchanted dreams. We usually recommend that if the person using the visco-elastic memory foam mattress pad weighs under 200lbs and they are just looking for added comfort they should get a 2" visco-elastic memory foam mattress pad, if they weigh over 200 we definitely recommend a 3" visco-elastic memory foam mattress pad and for those that weigh over 250lbs the 4" toppers are the best option for pressure point relief and comfort. The 3.3 Cloud9 visco-elastic memory foam is SUPER SOFT being less dense and having a softer compression or ILD rating. The 4.3 Cloud9 Topper is slightly firmer and provides a little more support while at the same time remaining soft and supple with a slightly more supportive compression or ILD. Our most luxurious 5.3 Cloud9 visco elastic memory foam is firmer than the 3.3 and 4.3 Cloud9.
feature_bullets: 20 Year Limited Warranty Direct From Cloud9 Bedding Visco Elastic Memory Bed Company
Exclusive formula makes you feel like you are floating on CLOUD9, sailing forth into a sea of dreams
Made in the USA, does not contain any toxic ingredients, new foam odors will disipate if aired out.
